Released: March 10, 2016

Company: Kitfox Games / Kitfox Games
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/moon_hunters

About:
A 1-4 player co-op "personality test" RPG about becoming a mythological hero in an ancient, occult world. The levels and map are different every time, giving you new choices, enemies, and opportunities to show your personality and become a legend.
Play alone, or up to 4 player co-op (online or local)
Shape your personality and reputation through choices & actions
Play multiple times to unlock more characters and start points

Minimum system requirements - Windows: 7 / 8 / 10 
Processor: Dual Core CPU - 2.6ghz
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Direct X: DirectX 9 
Graphics: 1GB of VRAM: Intel HD 3000 GPU / AMD HD 5450 / Nvidia 9400 GT 
Storage: 2 GB available space
Mouse, Keyboard
